text: [Music]
Trend Micro loves the AWS public sector
summits they are fantastic we always say
that innovation never comes from one
person so the ability to be in these
towns that are rich with technology have
our customers the AWS solution
architects and technologists together
with our solution partners all talking
about how we use the public cloud to
protect our environments and and deliver
applications faster we find the
innovation bubbles up we love the fact
that we can go from Brussels and talk
about gdpr to Washington DC and talk
about NIST frameworks to Canberra and
Ottawa and all these government towns
where government investment in both
public cloud and security is significant
it's unique there's no other place like
it the most impactful part of the public
sector summits are the ability to bring
AWS experts into a joint conversation
with our customers we often use events
like this to really get to the details
of how our customers are securing their
environment what features they want from
our products and having an AWS person in
the room at that summit when all these
topics are being bandied about and we
can really solution create right there
at the summit we will love that it's
fantastic our customers love it the
technologists love it and we're able to
actually design better products because
of it
[Music]
